archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Consolidation Process
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
Letters to be printed and delivered via post are consolidated
Letters to be printed are consolidated before sent to Print Service Provider to get better price.
1. Consolidated process is triggered by system scheduler once a day 2. All letters to be printed are located and consolidated into single output print file and formatted for Print (PDF) 3. Consolidated Print File is send to Print Service Provider
